html.p: This app incorporates the work of many fabuloous researches and developers, some honorary mentions;
html.ul:
OSSEM by Roberto Rodriguez
secops4thewin for his great visualizations
Swisscom for their Virustotal checker for new binaries
Sigma for the inspiration for several searches
Adam/Hexacorn Yogev Mizrahi and Nir Dagan for the Macro dashboard Lukas Ciasnoha for the ATTACK overview
All contributions to my Github
All the great tweets by people
